description: Try our easy to follow Easy Bolognese Pasta recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Easy Bolognese Pasta Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Serve Bolognese over pasta with parmesan cheese. Tip 1: Make a double batch of the bolognese and freeze for another meal. Tip 2: This sauce is also a great meat pie filling topped with mashed potato and cooked in a baking dish. Tip 3: Any left over pasta and sauce can be layered with fresh ricotta as an easy pasta bake, topped with shredded mozzarella.
